content: All riders will be accompanied by an English-speaking guide-driver
All drivers must bring a driverâ€™s license and any other supporting documents required to drive in Japan per the Activity Rules
Please do not wear high heels, long skirts, or other clothing that can interfere with driving the go-kart
All go-karts are for one person only
Recommended height to fit in the go-karts is 150-185 cm, and maximum weight is 100 kg (220 lb) in order to reach top speeds
You must refill the gas tank before returning the kart or pay an 800 JPY refill fee if returning with an unfilled tank

Due to very limited parking in Tokyo, we recommend against stopping the kart during the ride except as guided by our staff, and we cannot be responsible for any accidents or fines incurred due to unsafe or illegal parking

Pregnant guests can drive the go-karts, but the steering wheel may press against your stomach and could be uncomfortable. Pregnant guests who find they cannot fit comfortably in the go-kart can cancel for a full refund
